data.name: DESC_AAE_ALTERNATE_AOI
data.value: Area of Interest (polygon layer with exactly one selected feature)

data.name: DESC_AAE_USE_INVERSE
data.value: Use the inverse of the geometric operation above (ex: notifier AOI does not <xxx> feature)

data.name: DESC_AAE_USE_JOB_AOI
data.value: Use the AOI of the job being worked as the notifier AOI

data.name: DESC_AA_ATTACHMENT
data.value: File to be attached to the job

data.name: DESC_AA_ATTACHMENT_TYPE
data.value: How the file should be attached to the job

data.name: DESC_AA_JOB_ID
data.value: ID of the job to which the attachment will be added

data.name: DESC_AA_OUT_JOB_ID
data.value: ID of the job to which the attachment was added (output)

data.name: DESC_ACTJ_COMMENT
data.value: The comment to be added to the job

data.name: DESC_ACTJ_JOB_ID
data.value: ID of the job to which the comment will be added

data.name: DESC_ACTJ_OUT_JOB_ID
data.value: ID of the job to which the comment was added (output)

data.name: DESC_ADC_CHANGE_CONDITION
data.value: Change condition (how/when to check the where clauses)

data.name: DESC_ADC_TRY_EXISTING_EVALUATOR
data.value: Use/add to an existing dataset evaluator, if one is available

data.name: DESC_AJ_ASSIGNEE
data.value: User or group name of assignee

data.name: DESC_CJ_AOI
data.value: Area of interest (polygon layer with exactly one selected feature)

data.name: DESC_CLJ_JOB_CLOSED
data.value: ID of job that was closed (output)

data.name: DESC_CSN2_SENDER_EMAIL
data.value: E-mail address to be used for the sender (default uses Workflow Manager system notification settings)

data.name: DESC_CSN2_SENDER_NAME
data.value: Name to be used for the sender (default uses Workflow Manager system notification settings)

data.name: DESC_CSN2_SUBJECT
data.value: Subject line for the e-mail notification

data.name: DESC_CSN2_SUBSCRIBERS
data.value: Recipient list for the notification (tokens are allowed; use semicolons to delimit names)

data.name: DESC_CSN2_SUMMARIZE
data.value: Summarize multiple changes in a single notification message

data.name: DESC_CSN_EMAIL_NOTIFIER
data.value: E-mail notification type to use as a template for the spatial notification's e-mail

data.name: DESC_CSN_SUMMARIZE
data.value: Summarize multiple changes in a single notification message

data.name: DESC_DDW_DATA_WORKSPACE
data.value: Name of data workspace to be deleted

data.name: DESC_DELMXD_MAP_DOCUMENT
data.value: Map document to be deleted from the Workflow Manager database

data.name: DESC_DELMXD_OUT_MAP_DOCUMENT
data.value: The map document that was deleted

data.name: DESC_DELTAM_OUT_WORKBOOK
data.value: The Task Assistant workbook that was deleted

data.name: DESC_DELTAM_WORKBOOK
data.value: Task Assistant workbook to be deleted from the Workflow Manager database

data.name: DESC_DJ_JOB_DELETED
data.value: ID of job that was deleted (output)

data.name: DESC_DMXD_MXD_FILE_PATH
data.value: Target Map Document (path to output MXD file)

data.name: DESC_DMXD_SOURCE_NAME
data.value: Source Name (name of MXD to retrieve from database)

data.name: DESC_DOT_CHECKLIST
data.value: List of orphaned types for which to check

data.name: DESC_DOT_PREVIEW_CHANGES
data.value: Preview changes (do not actually delete any items)

data.name: DESC_DTAM_SOURCE_NAME
data.value: Source Name (name of TA workbook to retrieve from database)

data.name: DESC_DTAM_XML_FILE_PATH
data.value: Target Workbook (path to output Task Assistant workbook XML file)

data.name: DESC_IADC_GROUP_GROUP
data.value: AD group containing the full list of Workflow Manager groups (which themselves contain user assignments)

data.name: DESC_IADC_PRESERVE_CURRENT_USER
data.value: Preserve the executing user's login in the database (even if it's removed from the AD)

data.name: DESC_IADC_USER_GROUP
data.value: AD group containing the full list of Workflow Manager users

data.name: DESC_LJUQ_OUT_JOB_IDS
data.value: The list of job IDs retrieved by this query

data.name: DESC_LJUQ_QUERY_NAME
data.value: Name of the query to use

data.name: DESC_LJ_JOBS_TABLE_1
data.value: Path to {0} table (must match the default WMX DB location)
data.comment: Expected parameter is jobs table name

data.name: DESC_LJ_SQL_QUERY_FILTER_1
data.comment: Expected parameter is jobs table name

data.name: DESC_LU_GROUP_NAME
data.value: Name of group to list (blank lists all users)

data.name: DESC_MAA_PRESERVE_CURRENT_USER
data.value: Preserve the executing user's administrative access to the DB

data.name: DESC_MAA_PRIVILEGE_ACTION
data.value: Specifies whether to grant or revoke adminstrator access for the given user(s)

data.name: DESC_MPA_PRIVILEGE_ACTION
data.value: Specifies whether to grant or revoke the specified privilege(s) for the given group(s)

data.name: DESC_RPE_CHECKLIST
data.value: List of potential problems for which to check

data.name: DESC_RPE_OUT_LOG_FILE_PATH
data.value: Location of a text file to which problem descriptions will be written

data.name: DESC_RPE_OUT_NUM_ISSUES_FOUND
data.value: Number of potential problems found by the tool

data.name: DESC_SDW_DATA_WORKSPACE
data.value: Default data workspace for this job type

data.name: DESC_SDW_PARENT_VERSION
data.value: Default parent version for this job type

data.name: DESC_SJN_JOB_ID
data.value: ID of job for which the notification will be sent

data.name: DESC_SJN_OUT_JOB_ID
data.value: ID of job for which the notification was sent

data.name: DESC_UMXD_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Description of the map document (default/unchanged if blank)

data.name: DESC_UMXD_MXD_FILE_PATH
data.value: Source map document (path to MXD file)

data.name: DESC_UMXD_OUT_TARGET_NAME
data.value: Name of the map document in the Workflow Manager database after upload (output)

data.name: DESC_UMXD_OVERWRITE_EXISTING
data.value: Overwrite existing map documents of the same name

data.name: DESC_UMXD_TARGET_CATEGORY
data.value: Category in which to store the map document (default/unchanged if blank)

data.name: DESC_UMXD_TARGET_NAME
data.value: Name of the map document in the Workflow Manager database after upload

data.name: DESC_UTAM_OUT_TARGET_NAME
data.value: Name of the TAM workbook in the Workflow Manager database after upload (output)

data.name: DESC_UTAM_OVERWRITE_EXISTING
data.value: Overwrite existing workbooks of the same name

data.name: DESC_UTAM_TARGET_NAME
data.value: Name of the TAM workbook in Workflow Manager database after upload

data.name: DESC_UTAM_XML_FILE_PATH
data.value: Source workbook (path to Task Assistant workbook XML file)

data.name: ERROR_ADD_AREA_EVALUATOR
data.value: Problem adding an area evaluator to the specified spatial notifier

data.name: ERROR_ADD_DATASET_CONDITION
data.value: Problem adding a dataset condition to the specified spatial notifier/dataset evaluator

data.name: ERROR_AOI_INPUT
data.value: General problem wirh AOI layer; ensure that it is an in-memory layer (not a feature class), that any DB connection is valid, etc.

data.name: ERROR_AOI_NOT_POLYGON
data.value: Only polygon features may be used for AOI definition

data.name: ERROR_AOI_OVERLAP
data.value: Proposed job AOI overlaps with one or more existing jobs (not allowed by system policy)

data.name: ERROR_CANNOT_CLOSE_JOB
data.value: The specified job cannot be closed at this time

data.name: ERROR_DELETE_MXD
data.value: Problem deleting the specified map document from the Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_DELETE_TAM
data.value: Problem deleting the specified Task Assistant workbook from the Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_DUE_DATE_LT_START_DATE
data.value: Due date cannot be earlier than the start date

data.name: ERROR_EXPECTED_ONE_SELECTED_FEATURE
data.value: Incorrect number of selected features; exactly one feature must be selected in AOI layer if a layer is specified

data.name: ERROR_INVALID_WMX_DB
data.value: Specified Workflow Manager database is invalid or inaccessible

data.name: ERROR_JOB_ASSIGNMENT_IGNORED
data.value: Assignee type is not specified; assignee will be ignored

data.name: ERROR_JOB_ID_PARSE
data.value: Could not get an int value from the retrieved job ID; is a Workflow Manager table corrupt?

data.name: ERROR_LICENSE_RELATED
data.value: License problem; verify that core and Workflow Manager licenses are available and checked out, license server is reachable, etc.

data.name: ERROR_MXD_DOWNLOAD
data.value: Problem downloading the map document from the Workflow Manager database or saving it to file

data.name: ERROR_MXD_UPLOAD
data.value: Problem opening the map document or storing it to the Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_NO_ADD_ATTACHMENTS_HELD_JOBS
data.value: Current user does not have permission to add attachments to held jobs

data.name: ERROR_NO_ADD_COMMENTS_HELD_JOBS
data.value: Current user does not have permission to add comments to held jobs

data.name: ERROR_NO_ASSIGN_JOB_PRIVILEGE
data.value: Current user does not have permission to assign jobs

data.name: ERROR_NO_CLOSE_JOB_PRIVILEGE
data.value: Current user does not have permission to close jobs

data.name: ERROR_NO_CREATE_JOB_PRIVILEGE
data.value: Current user does not have permission to create jobs

data.name: ERROR_NO_DELETE_JOB_PRIVILEGE
data.value: Current user does not have permission to delete jobs

data.name: ERROR_NO_MANAGE_ATTACHMENTS_PRIVILEGE
data.value: Current user does not have permission to add/remove job attachments

data.name: ERROR_NO_OR_MULTIPLE_STEPS
data.value: The specified job must have exactly one active/current step; multiple active steps (or no active steps) are not allowed

data.name: ERROR_NO_SPATIAL_NOTIFICATIONS_FOUND
data.value: No spatial notifications found in Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_NO_WORKSPACES_DEFINED
data.value: No data workspaces found in Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_OPERATOR_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Operator is not supported in this context; use one of '<', '<=', '>', '>=', '=', '<>' or 'Contains'

data.name: ERROR_SPATIAL_NOTIFICATION_CREATION
data.value: An error occurred while creating the spatial notification

data.name: ERROR_SPATIAL_NOTIFICATION_EXISTS
data.value: A spatial notification with the given name already exists

data.name: ERROR_TAM_DOWNLOAD
data.value: Problem downloading the Task Assistant workbook from the Workflow Manager database or saving it to file

data.name: ERROR_TAM_UPLOAD
data.value: Problem opening the Task Assistant workbook or storing it to the Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_UNSPECIFIED
data.value: An error occurred while running the tool

data.name: ERROR_USER_NOT_ADMIN
data.value: The current user is not an administrator on the Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_USER_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Specified user not found in Workflow Manager database

data.name: ERROR_VERSION_LOOKUP
data.value: Could not determine the available versions for the specified data workspace

data.name: ERROR_WORKSPACE
data.value: Problem connecting to workspace, or no versions detected?

data.name: ERROR_WORKSPACE_FETCH
data.value: Could not load a data workspace from the current spreadsheet row

data.name: ERROR_WORKSPACE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: The specified data workspace cannot be found in the Workflow Manager database

data.name: TOOL_ADD_AREA_EVALUATOR_TO_SN
data.value: Add Area Evaluator to Spatial Notification

data.name: TOOL_ADD_DATASET_CONDITION_TO_SN
data.value: Add Dataset Condition to Spatial Notification

data.name: TOOL_CREATE_DATA_WORKSPACES_FROM_SPREADSHEET
data.value: Create Data Workspaces from Excel Spreadsheet

data.name: TOOL_CREATE_SPATIAL_NOTIFICATION_WITH_EMAIL
data.value: Create Spatial Notification with E-mail Notifier

data.name: TOOL_CREATE_SPATIAL_NOTIFICATION_WITH_EMAIL_2
data.value: Create Spatial Notification with E-mail Notifier 2

data.name: TOOL_EXPORT_DATA_WORKSPACES_TO_SPREADSHEET
data.value: Export Data Workspaces to Excel Spreadsheet

data.name: TOOL_SET_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE_FOR_JOB_TYPE
data.value: Set Default Workspace for Job Type
